page.title: 01CENSUS OF CHEVINTON
page.content: Of 118 families questioned 76 lived in a house, 42 in a bungalow Under 5yrs 26 5-16yrs 42 16-21yrs 20 21-65yrs 170 Over 65yrs 30 50 people used the Post Office more than once a week, 32 less, 1 never Usage of bus: regularly 13 sometimes 16, never 34 19 people thought there is enough buses 22 people would like more 35 people used the shop more than once a week, 25 less than once a week Usage of clubs in village: Womens Inst. 12 Friday 27 Choir 6 Monday 12 Other Clubs 11 Church attended regularly by 48 14 work in Chevington-97 out of village 75 go by car 2 by bus 8 cycle Other activities needed: play/games/recreation ground disco/youth club for teenagers evening classes/dancing club
